name: Arroyo
description: Arroyo (English: Stream or Creek) is one of the sub-districts of Santo Domingo, located in southeastern Night City. The Arroyo sub-district is always under constant construction, and in 2077 it consists of an old-fashioned power plant, robot factories, a logistics center, and a gigantic junkyard. Not every corporate investment has turned out to be profitable, and a significant number of buildings in this area are unfinished, either partially constructed or simply laying in complete ruin.
